thread.title: 2 dead, 2 injured in Balochistan gun attack on Hazaras
thread.title_full: 2 dead, 2 injured in Balochistan gun attack on Hazaras

author: none@none.com (Syed Ali Shah | Hafizullah Sheerani)
title: 2 dead, 2 injured in Balochistan gun attack on Hazaras
text:
Unidentified assailants on Friday shot and injured four members of the Hazara community on Spini Road in Quetta's Kila Mubarak area, police said.
The victims of the shooting were shifted to the Bolan Medical Complex, where two later succumbed to their injuries whereas two are said to be in critical condition, police said.
The four individuals were targeted while they were travelling in a taxi, DawnNews reported.
